modName: Snow Elf Race - The True Falmer - DELETED
summary: Brings the Snow Elves back to Skyrim (I know there are other SE mods, however this is a separation and rework of a previous mod.
descriptionHtml:
If anyone wants to port/use the assets to recreate the race for the Special Edition or on XboxOne, go ahead.

Requires Dawnguard
Why is it an esm? so that people can create mods around it. (e.g. follower mods if they so wish)

Update 0.8
I always get nervous when I release a new version, just in case I missed something, or forgot some files. Anyway update 0.8 is up and for those that might be making followers/addons for this, sorry but I changed the prefix for my added files in the CK from SE to Truefalmer, because from the moment I uploaded the first version, I realised that SE might be used by others and potentially cause compatibility issues.
Just some things you need to know.

1. You now have to get Racial Compatibility from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]TMPhoenix[/url] if you don't, you won't have proper compatibility and might have issues with vampires. Also if you don't you might get a CTD before the main menu loads when you first start up the game.

2. Not everything I added is actually available in the game. Everything's in a chest though, so type COC truefalmertestcell01 (I hope that's correct) and you can warp there.

3. There's sword, shield, bow and arrows added, as well as Iron armour for those that are starting a new game. The Iron armour is a mix of light and heavy armour.

[url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/personnages/races/renaissance_des_falmers.php]French translation thanks to Zeidra[/url] (old version)

Update 0.7
This will probably be the last update for a while.
This update Racial Compatibility to the most recent version by TMPhoenix.
It also darkens some of the hair files so that they aren't stupidly white, and fixes the Normal map on the plain Ivory armour.

Update 0.6
Made it so that one could smith plain looking Ivory armour from the get go. It is weaker though.
Added helmet thanks to MadCat221
Altered colours of the robes. Base is grey-white with the others blue-white and red-white.

Also added Ethereal Elven compatibility and CBBE/UNP compat.

____________________________________________________________________
The Snow Elves have 50% resistance to frost
Can shield themselves in frost for 120 seconds once a day.

Can create Snow Elf armour and Robes (Reinforced Armour requires Advanced Armors perk, but weaker basic armour can be made from the start. Plus only base non-magical robes can be made without arcane smithing perk.)

Can make Ivory ingots with moonstone plus mammoth tusk (used to make Ivory Armour.

Skill Bonuses
Archery - 10
One Handed - 5
Light Armor - 5
Destruction - 5
Speech - 5
Alteration - 5

ANSWERS FOR EXPECTED QUESTIONS:

Most of the beards are red because people want to be able to use custom hair, and this is what vanilla textures look like when colour form is set to white. The white beards are custom.

Some apachii hairs cannot be selected if you have it installed because they're separated via elven and human. Unless you want every snow elf to have red hair, I cannot make it so that it's fully compatible with it.


Thanks to expired for Racial Compatibility and also TMPhoenix for keeping it up to date. It can be found here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]here[/url]

Thanks to MadCat221 for letting me use his awesome open faced Ebony Helmet from his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4866/?]here[/url]

Also thanks to Nuska for the Ethereal Elven overhaul and having it as a modders resource. It can be found here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]here[/url]

And finally thanks to navetsea for giving their CBBE UNP textures for use on mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
author: Hallgarth
